page.title: 07Nottingham Airport 2
page.content: {Nottingham Airport}is used as a flying club where people can learn how to fly aeroplanes. They give training for people who want to get a Private Pilot's licence. Some night flying is done by people who are training. There is also a self-fly hire service of light aircraft. The{Air Taxi}service is very useful for local business people. Small light aircraft like Pipers, Robins, Chipmunks and Cessnas are used. Some helicopters are also flown from the Airport. Passengers are able to depart and land when they wish which makes it a very useful service for the local people. The Airport is run by{Truman {Aviation Ltd.
